googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.vbmAbsenteeBallotRules: Any registered California voter can request an absentee ballot and vote by mail.
googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.idRequirementsOvr: You will need a California driver's license or state ID card to register to vote online.  If you don't have one, you can register to vote by mail or in person.
googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.idRequirementsSdr: Bring your California driver's license or state ID card with you. If you don't have one, bring ONE photo ID that shows your name, and ONE official document that shows your name and California address. Acceptable documents include a utility bill, bank statement, paycheck, residential lease, or any government document that shows your name and address.
